sentences.en: After all, what more can anyone be than themselves?
sentences.cn: 毕竟，人们除了做自己又能怎样呢？

sentences.en: Art has real meaning when it helps people to understand themselves.
sentences.cn: 当艺术有助于人们了解自身的时候才有真正的意义。

sentences.en: By bathing in unclean water, they expose themselves to contamination.
sentences.cn: 在不干净的水中洗澡，他们可能会受到感染。

sentences.en: I find no pleasure in seeing people make asses of themselves.
sentences.cn: 我看见人们出洋相并不幸灾乐祸。

sentences.en: Many manufacturers have policies to protect themselves against blackmailers.
sentences.cn: 许多厂家都购买了保险，以防遭到敲诈。

sentences.en: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.cn: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.en: People will work themselves up into a state about anything.
sentences.cn: 人们总会沉不住气，为任何事感到担忧。

sentences.en: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.cn: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.en: The enemy must be digging themselves in now ready for the attack.
sentences.cn: 敌人现在一定在挖掩体，准备迎接进攻。

sentences.en: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.cn: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

sentences.en: The King has merely given the politicians enough rope to hang themselves.
sentences.cn: 国王只不过是给了这些政客自缚的绳子。

sentences.en: The majority of sex offenders have a low opinion of themselves.
sentences.cn: 大多数性犯罪者都瞧不起自己。

sentences.en: The small British crowd roared themselves hoarse, waving their Union Jacks.
sentences.cn: 一小群英国人挥舞着国旗，吼得嗓子都沙哑了。

sentences.en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
sentences.cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

sentences.en: They find it difficult to pump themselves up for the games.
sentences.cn: 他们感到要为自己加油打气，自信满满地去打比赛并不容易。

sentences.en: They left themselves wide open to accusations of double standards and hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 他们使自己陷于被人指责搞双重标准和虚伪不实的境地。

sentences.en: Those people who took up weapons to defend themselves are political prisoners.
sentences.cn: 那些拿起武器自卫的人是些政治犯。

sentences.en: Today's elections are of no great importance in themselves.
sentences.cn: 今天的选举本身并不是很重要。

phrases.tran_cn: 见be 条 be oneself, not be oneself

phrases.phrase: Take care of the pence, and the pounds will take care of themselves.

trans.tran_cn: 他[她，它]们自己，他们亲自，“himself”的复数，“herself”的复数
trans.tran_en: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action
